page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: The 4x3 km. area includes a small part of Clydebank,the town of Erskine,the village of Inchinnan and surrounding farmlands.It is mainly rural but the new community of Erskine,which began its development over ten years ago, is still growing. The main features of the area highlighted in the text are: local schools,churches,shops and library,a community farm,Erskine Hospital,Radio Erskine,the Automobile Association Headquarters,the Crest Hotel and the police station. The text includes examples of everyday life,habits,preferences and recreational pastimes of Erskine residents.
